name: Introduction to Film Studies
description: An overview of the history of film, the production processes, and its impact on society.

name: Film Aesthetics
description: An exploration of the visual and narrative elements of film, and how they work together to create an impactful experience.

name: Film Genres
description: A look at the different genres of film, and how they shape the film experience.

name: Narrative Theory and Criticism
description: An exploration of the key theories and modes of analysis of film, as well as a discussion on the development of film criticism.

name: History of World Cinema
description: An overview of the history of world cinema, from its inception to its modern influence.
